name: A Vampire In Rodentia
description:
Cursed with eternal hunger and a thirst for blood, you now live your life from Sunset to Sunrise.

You have learned to survive by feeding on the villagers of Rodentia; stunning those who guard the village, threatening your existence; and hiding to avoid detection.

With the searing light of the sun on your tail, can you quench your thirst and return to darkness in time?

Let the time for feeding commence...

Credits:

3D Models, Art, Animation - Muffin

Level Design - Ben Bird-Jones

Composer, Sound Designer - Kitarraman

Software Developer, User Interface - Carly Meyerhardt

Source: https://github.com/cmeyerhardt/A_Vampire_In_Rodentia
